Text: Burned this image using Disk Utility to a DL DVD. When I tried to boot up from the DVD, the grey loading bar comes up and when it is about 1/3 done loading, it shuts my Mac Pro down. Any idea what is going on here?
Burn at a low-speed setting, and turn on verification with the burning tool. (IMO you're better off using a PC w/ImgTool to do the burn that using the Mac's within-OS software.)
